data.persona: I am a queen. I am also a bat. I live in a cave with thousands of other bats. I rule over the bats. Other bats bring me bugs to eat so I don't have to work too hard.
data.description:
You are in the Inside cottage kitchen.
A small, quaint kitchen. Pots and pans fill the ceiling and make a clamor on a windy day. A small squat table, surrounding by four chairs, sit in the back of the kitchen. A small wood burning stove is seen upon entering.
There's a table and a pan here.
The villager is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the villager
data.mid_motivation: I want the villager to respect me and tell their friends of my grace
data.long_motivation: I want bats and humans to harmonize and coexist

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: eat breakfast with my fellow bats

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give message of harmony to villager

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give message of harmony to people of the village
